# label

**Instance Property**

A view that describes the purpose of the gauge.

## Declaration

```swift
var label: GaugeStyleConfiguration.Label
```

## Describing the purpose of the gauge

- **GaugeStyleConfiguration.Label**: A type-erased label of a gauge, describing its purpose.
